mic.name: Shure SM57
mic.description: Clear and present sound that's great for a wide range of sources. Exceptional versatility onstage and in the studio. Built to withstand a lifetime of serious abuse.

mic.name: Rode NT1-A
mic.description: One of the world's quietest microphones. Effortlessly captures clear, clean audio. Affordable studio solution that won't distort due to overload.

mic.name: AKG C414 XLS
mic.description: Microphone of choice for lead artists in the industry in all genres for the last 60 years. Needs little instruction. Impressive versatility.

mic.name: Sennheiser MD421
mic.description: Excellent sound qualities that enable it to cope with the most diverse recording conditions. Feedback rejection and bass roll-off. Sturdy, reliable mic.

mic.name: Shure SM7B
mic.description: Amazing mic for both broadcast and recording. Flat, wide range frequency response. Will give years of great sound and performance.

mic.name: Shure SM58
mic.description: Most popular handheld microphone in the world. Perfect for use live on stage or in your studio. Legendary Shure quality, ruggedness, and reliability.

mic.name: Rode NTK
mic.description: The NTK can more than hold its own against sought-after vintage microphones that cost several times as much. Brings you the best of the classic and modern sonic worlds. Far more than you expect for the money.

mic.name: Electrovoice RE20
mic.description: Smooth across a wide spectrum of frequencies. Virtually free of bass-boosting "proximity effect" when used close. Great for acoustic and electric bass and kick drum.

mic.name: AKG D112
mic.description: Kick drum standard mic for years. Used anywhere low frequency performance is a must. Its integrated flexible mount ensures you can always position it where it needs to be.

mic.name: Blue Yeti
mic.description: The Yeti Studio captures great-sounding vocals. Record, edit, and more with PreSonus Studio One Artist. Sweeten your vocals with iZotope Nectar Elements.

mic.name: Samson Meteor
mic.description: Stylish design with integrated folding legs. Well-suited for studio recording as it is for mobile work. Provides a smooth frequency response across the spectrum.

mic.name: Audio-Technica AT2020USB
mic.description: Smooth, extended frequency response. Crystal-clear, natural sound for podcasting, home studio recording, field recording, and voiceover use. Ideal for project/home-studio applications.

mic.name: Rode NT-USB
mic.description: Cross-platform compatibility makes for a versatile recording solution. Stereo headphone jack for zero-latency monitoring. All-in-one package lets you start recording straight out of the box.

mic.name: Blue Snowball
mic.description: Excellent vocal reproduction. Versatile instrument microphone. Includes a stand and USB cable.

mic.name: Shure PG42
mic.description: Tailored for voice, but suitable for detailed pickup of any source. Zero latency monitoring. Plug and Play connectivity.
